channel.title: Wild level display
channel.description:
Ok guys, I need a little help. Does anyone know how I can get the wild to display the levels (Corner of the screen). As an addition if it isnt too much trouble I'd like to know how I can edit the range of levels that can be attacked (I.E. "The difference in your levels is too great! You must go deeper into the wild to the wild to attack this person") Any and all help is apreciated
-Thanks Zukyak

item.title: Wild level display
